pr_title: [avmfritz] Avoid a hidden NPE when getIdentifier() of an uninitialized ThingHandler is called

timeline.message:
Avoid a hidden NPE when getIdentifier() of an uninitialized ThingHandler is colled

Signed-off-by: Christoph Weitkamp <github@christophweitkamp.de>
